extension.name: Easy File Uploader
extension.author: Michael Gilkes
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Michael Albert Gilkes. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This is a flexible file upload module. It allows the administrator to specify a destination folder, and allows the user to upload files to it. The administrator can also specify how many files that can be uploaded simultaneously, as well as the text in the front end. You can even have more then one module of its kind on the same page. See readme.txt for usage instructions.

field.name: efu_label
field.label: Label Text
field.description: This is the text that labels the upload file form.

field.name: efu_button
field.label: Submit Button Text
field.description: This is the text that is on the button to upload the file.

field.name: efu_folder
field.label: Choose the Upload Folder
field.description: This is the folder where the uploaded files are stored.

field.name: efu_maxsize
field.label: Maximum File Size (bytes)
field.description: This is the maximum allowable file size, in bytes, that can be uploaded.

field.name: results_bgcolor
field.label: Results Box Background Color
field.description: The background color of the Results information box.

field.name: efu_filetypes
field.label: Permitted file types (separate by semi-colon).
field.description: This is a list of the file types that are permitted to be uploaded (separated by semi-colon). Type asterisk (*) to allow any type.

field.name: efu_question
field.default: Replace existing files with uploaded files?
field.label: Replace Files Question
field.description: This is the text that labels the option of whether the user wants to replace existing files.

field.name: efu_yes
field.label: Yes answer text
field.description: You are free to customize the YES answer text to the replace question.

field.name: efu_no
field.label: No answer text
field.description: You care free to customize the NO answer text to the replace question.

field.name: efu_replace
field.label: Include option to replace existing file?
field.description: This allows the administrator to decide whether to include an option in the front-end to replace en existing file with the same file name as the file to be uploaded.

field.name: efu_variable
field.label: Input File Variable Name
field.description: This allows you to specify the variable name of the input file. Only change this if you intend to have more than one Easy File Uploader module on a single article page. In that case, each module should have its own unique name.

field.name: efu_multiple
field.label: Number of Files to Upload
field.description: Select the number of upload file fields to include. The default is to upload 1 file, but you may select up to 10 files to upload simultaneously.

field.name: efu_user
field.label: Upload to Username subfolders
field.description: Setting this to YES will upload files to a subfolder in the Upload folder with the user's username.
